title: What is CUET?
text: The Common University Entrance Test (CUET) is a centralized entrance test for undergraduate and integrated courses across central universities in India. PW offers dedicated CUET coaching.

title: CUET Syllabus Coverage
text: Physics Wallah covers all CUET domains including Language, Domain-Specific Subjects, General Test, and interviews through structured modules.

title: CUET Language Preparation
text: CUET coaching includes Language modules (English and other regional languages), focusing on grammar, comprehension, vocabulary, and writing skills.

title: Domain-Specific Subject Modules
text: Courses cover CUET Domain subjects like Physics, Chemistry, Maths, Biology, Economics, History with MCQs, concepts, and doubt support.

title: CUET General Test Prep
text: General test includes Quantitative Aptitude, Logical Reasoning, General Knowledge, and Ability sections for CUET aspirants.

title: CUET Pattern & Format
text: CUET pattern consists of multiple-choice questions across sections, negative marking, sectional timing—PW explains every detail.

title: CUET Previous Year Question Practice
text: PW offers CUET PYQ compilations for Language, Domain, and General Test sections with detailed explanations.

title: Speed Techniques for MCQs
text: MCQ solving techniques, elimination strategies, and time-saving heuristics for CUET Negotiation and General Test.

title: CUET Mock Test Series
text: Full-length CUET mock tests simulate real exam environment and provide detailed analytics and performance reports.

title: Topic-Wise CUET Tests
text: Each domain and general test domain has topic-specific mini-tests to pinpoint weaknesses and strengths.

title: CUET Formula & Concept Sheets
text: Quick-reference formula sheets for Domain subjects (Maths, Physics) and key points for Language modules.

title: CUET Grammar Quizzes
text: Grammar quizzes are provided to strengthen Language competence, covering parts of speech, fill-in-the-blanks, and sentence corrections.

title: Vocabulary Builder for CUET
text: Daily vocabulary lists with meanings, usage, and synonyms to enhance CUET Language module performance.

title: Comprehension Passage Strategies
text: Techniques for passage reading, annotation, time allocation, and answer elimination in CUET Reading sections.

title: CUET Logical Reasoning Practice
text: Dozens of LR puzzles, seating, sequence, critical reasoning sets tailored to CUET for consistency and pattern recognition.

title: CUET Quantitative Aptitude Practice
text: Dedicated QA practice sets with step-by-step solutions, covering arithmetic, algebra, geometry, and data interpretation.

title: CUET General Knowledge Trends
text: Weekly GK capsules feature current affairs, static GK, and subject-based facts to cover the General Test section thoroughly.

title: CUET Essay & Writing Skills
text: Training modules teach essay writing, precis, letter writing, and application writing skills needed for some CUET exams.

title: Post Mock Analysis Session
text: After every mock test, PW conducts reflection sessions highlighting mistakes, time management, and improvement tips.

title: CUET Time Management Techniques
text: Time-blocking strategies and attempt order tips help students maximize scores in time-bound CUET sections.

title: CUET Coaching Fee Structure
text: PW publishes clear fee breakup for CUET modules, including domain tests, general test, revisions, and mentor support.

title: CUET Admissions Guidance
text: Counseling sessions help students decode university choices, cutoffs, reservation policies, and application timelines.

title: Language Doubt Clearing
text: Dedicated live sessions resolve doubts in grammar, vocabulary, comprehension, and writing skills for Language CUET sections.

title: Domain Subject Doubt Support
text: Interactive doubt sessions are held for Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Economics CUET subjects.

title: CUET Study Planner
text: A digital planner helps schedule CUET modules, tests, revisions, and subject resets based on target exam date.

title: CUET Offline Workshops
text: In-person workshop series are conducted periodically in major cities to reinforce Domain and General Test concepts.

title: CUET Performance Dashboard
text: Interactive dashboard tracks scores, percentile, time per section, and accuracy trends across mock tests.

title: Weekly Papers & Reports
text: Curated weekly papers are followed by detailed reports analyzing weak areas, topic coverage, and pattern calls.

title: Final 30-Day CUET Plan
text: A condensed study schedule with daily tests, topic refreshers, and mock-retake adjustments optimized for last month.

title: CUET Motivation Sessions
text: Motivational and stress-management webinars are organized for aspirants during high-pressure phases.

title: CUET + Boards Dual Prep
text: Courses are structured to align CUET prep with board exam requirements, minimizing additional load.

title: CUET Career Counseling
text: Expert sessions guide students on choosing streams, universities, and courses based on CUET performance.

title: CUET Exam Day Strategy
text: Exam-day tips include sectional time allotment, stress control, elimination methods, and sectional skipping strategy.

title: CUET After-Test Review
text: Post-test reviews cover right answers, reasoning paths, common traps, and strategic takeaways for improvement.

title: Video Playback Speed for CUET
text: Students can watch CUET module videos at 1.25x–2x speed to optimize revision and revisit tough concepts quickly.

title: CUET Offline Centres
text: Physics Wallah has offline study centres offering workshops and revision sessions for CUET in profile cities.

title: Weekly Live Q&A Sessions
text: A weekly live Q&A session resolves doubts across CUET sections with topic-level faculty interaction.

title: Downloadable CUET Notes & PDFs
text: CUET study materials, formula sheets, vocabulary lists, and grammar notes are available as PDF downloads.

title: CUET Performance Badges
text: Students earn badges in appraisal milestones during CUET prep—scoring thresholds, test streaks, and mastery.
